file.name: yfrake_spec.yaml
file.content:
components:
  schemas:
    BaseResponse:
      properties:
        data:
          nullable: true
          properties: {}
          type: object
        endpoint:
          type: string
        error:
          nullable: true
          properties:
            code:
              type: integer
            msg:
              type: string
            type:
              type: string
          type: object
      type: object
info:
  contact:
    email: mattias.aabmets@gmail.com
    name: Mattias Aabmets
    url: https://github.com/aspenforest/yfrake
  description: A fast and flexible stock market, forex and cryptocurrencies data provider.
  license:
    name: MIT License
    url: https://github.com/aspenforest/yfrake/blob/main/LICENSE
  title: YFrake
  version: 2.1.2
openapi: 3.0.0
paths:
  /balance_statements:
    get:
      description: Returns the balance statements of a security identifier.
      parameters:
      - description: Any valid equity security identifier.
        in: query
        name: symbol
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/BaseResponse'
          description: Successful Request
      summary: Balance Statements
  /calendar_events:
    get:
      description: Returns the calendar events of a security identifier.
      parameters:
      - description: Any valid equity security identifier.
        in: query
        name: symbol
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/BaseResponse'
          description: Successful Request
      summary: Calendar Events
  /cashflow_statements:
    get:
      description: Returns the cashflow statements of a security identifier.
      parameters:
      - description: Any valid equity security identifier.
        in: query
        name: symbol
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/BaseResponse'
          description: Successful Request
      summary: Cashflow Statements
  /company_overview:
    get:
      description: Returns the company overview of a security identifier.
      parameters:
      - description: Any valid equity security identifier.
        in: query
        name: symbol
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/BaseResponse'
          description: Successful Request
      summary: Company Overview
  /currencies:
    get:
      description: Returns the list of existing currencies.
      parameters: []
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/BaseResponse'
          description: Successful Request
      summary: Currencies
  /detailed_summary:
    get:
      description: Returns the detailed summary of a security identifier.
      parameters:
      - description: Any valid equity security identifier.
        in: query
        name: symbol
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/BaseResponse'
          description: Successful Request
      summary: Detailed Summary
  /earnings:
    get:
      description: Returns the earnings of a security identifier.
      parameters:
      - description: Any valid equity security identifier.
        in: query
        name: symbol
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/BaseResponse'
          description: Successful Request
      summary: Earnings
  /earnings_history:
    get:
      description: Returns the earnings history of a security identifier.
      parameters:
      - description: Any valid equity security identifier.
        in: query
        name: symbol
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/BaseResponse'
          description: Successful Request
      summary: Earnings History
  /earnings_trend:
    get:
      description: Returns the earnings trend of a security identifier.
      parameters:
      - description: Any valid equity security identifier.
        in: query
        name: symbol
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/BaseResponse'
          description: Successful Request
      summary: Earnings Trend
  /esg_chart:
    get:
      description: Returns historical ESG ratings of a security identifier and its
        peer group.
      parameters:
      - description: Any valid equity security identifier.
        in: query
        name: symbol
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/BaseResponse'
          description: Successful Request
      summary: ESG Chart
  /esg_scores:
    get:
      description: Returns current ESG scores of a security identifier and its peer
        group.
      parameters:
      - description: Any valid equity security identifier.
        in: query
        name: symbol
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/BaseResponse'
          description: Successful Request
      summary: ESG Scores
  /financials:
    get:
      description: Returns the financials of a security identifier.
      parameters:
      - description: Any valid equity security identifier.
        in: query
        name: symbol
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/BaseResponse'
          description: Successful Request
      summary: Financials
  /fund_ownership:
    get:
      description: Returns the fund ownership of a security identifier.
      parameters:
      - description: Any valid equity security identifier.
        in: query
        name: symbol
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/BaseResponse'
          description: Successful Request
      summary: Fund Ownership
  /historical_prices:
    get:
      description: Returns historical prices of a security identifier.
      parameters:
      - description: Any valid equity security identifier.
        in: query
        name: symbol
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
      - description: Time granularity of the returned data points.
        in: query
        name: interval
        required: true
        schema:
          enum:
          - 1m
          - 2m
          - 5m
          - 15m
          - 30m
          - 60m
          - 90m
          - 1h
          - 1d
          - 5d
          - 1wk
          - 1mo
          - 3mo
          type: string
      - description: Time span of the returned data points.
        in: query
        name: range
        required: false
        schema:
          enum:
          - 1d
          - 5d
          - 1mo
          - 3mo
          - 6mo
          - 1y
          - 2y
          - 5y
          - 10y
          - ytd
          - max
          type: string
      - description: Start date encoded as an UNIX epoch timestamp.
        in: query
        name: startDate
        required: false
        schema:
          type: integer
      - description: End date encoded as an UNIX epoch timestamp.
        in: query
        name: endDate
        required: false
        schema:
          type: integer
      - description: Quantity of data points from start date.
        in: query
        name: numberOfPoints
        required: false
        schema:
          type: integer
      - description: Option to include dividends and splits.
        in: query
        name: events
        required: false
        schema:
          type: boolean
      - description: Option to include extended hours prices.
        in: query
        name: extHours
        required: false
        schema:
          type: boolean
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/BaseResponse'
          description: Successful Request
      summary: Historical Prices
  /income_statements:
    get:
      description: Returns the income statements of a security identifier.
      parameters:
      - description: Any valid equity security identifier.
        in: query
        name: symbol
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/BaseResponse'
          description: Successful Request
      summary: Income Statements
  /insider_holders:
    get:
      description: Returns the insider holders of a security identifier.
      parameters:
      - description: Any valid equity security identifier.
        in: query
        name: symbol
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/BaseResponse'
          description: Successful Request
      summary: Insider Holders
  /insider_transactions:
    get:
      description: Returns the insider transactions of a security identifier.
      parameters:
      - description: Any valid equity security identifier.
        in: query
        name: symbol
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/BaseResponse'
          description: Successful Request
      summary: Insider Transactions
  /insights:
    get:
      description: Returns the sentiment and valuation of a security identifier.
      parameters:
      - description: Any valid equity security identifier.
        in: query
        name: symbol
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/BaseResponse'
          description: Successful Request
      summary: Insights
  /institution_ownership:
    get:
      description: Returns the institution ownership of a security identifier.
      parameters:
      - description: Any valid equity security identifier.
        in: query
        name: symbol
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/BaseResponse'
          description: Successful Request
      summary: Institution Ownership
  /key_statistics:
    get:
      description: Returns the key statistics of a security identifier.
      parameters:
      - description: Any valid equity security identifier.
        in: query
        name: symbol
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/BaseResponse'
          description: Successful Request
      summary: Key Statistics
  /major_holders:
    get:
      description: Returns the major holders of a security identifier.
      parameters:
      - description: Any valid equity security identifier.
        in: query
        name: symbol
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/BaseResponse'
          description: Successful Request
      summary: Major Holders
  /market_summary:
    get:
      description: Returns information about stock market exchanges.
      parameters: []
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/BaseResponse'
          description: Successful Request
      summary: Market Summary
  /news:
    get:
      description: Returns the latest news about the provided security identifier.
      parameters:
      - description: Any valid equity security identifier.
        in: query
        name: symbol
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/BaseResponse'
          description: Successful Request
      summary: News
  /options:
    get:
      description: Returns options data of a security identifier.
      parameters:
      - description: Any valid equity security identifier.
        in: query
        name: symbol
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
      - description: Start date encoded as an UNIX epoch timestamp.
        in: query
        name: startDate
        required: false
        schema:
          type: integer
      - description: End date encoded as an UNIX epoch timestamp.
        in: query
        name: endDate
        required: false
        schema:
          type: integer
      - description: Minimum strike price of options.
        in: query
        name: strikeMin
        required: false
        schema:
          type: integer
      - description: Maximum strike price of options.
        in: query
        name: strikeMax
        required: false
        schema:
          type: integer
      - description: Return transactions in straddles.
        in: query
        name: straddle
        required: false
        schema:
          type: boolean
      - description: Return all options data.
        in: query
        name: getAllData
        required: false
        schema:
          type: boolean
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/BaseResponse'
          description: Successful Request
      summary: Options
  /price_overview:
    get:
      description: Returns the price overview of a security identifier.
      parameters:
      - description: Any valid equity security identifier.
        in: query
        name: symbol
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/BaseResponse'
          description: Successful Request
      summary: Price Overview
  /purchase_activity:
    get:
      description: Returns the purchase activity of a security identifier.
      parameters:
      - description: Any valid equity security identifier.
        in: query
        name: symbol
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/BaseResponse'
          description: Successful Request
      summary: Purchase Activity
  /quote_type:
    get:
      description: Returns the asset type of the provided security identifier.
      parameters:
      - description: Any valid equity security identifier.
        in: query
        name: symbol
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/BaseResponse'
          description: Successful Request
      summary: Quote Type
  /quotes_overview:
    get:
      description: Returns the financial overviews of a list of security identifiers.
      parameters:
      - description: Comma-separated list of valid security identifiers.
        in: query
        name: symbols
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/BaseResponse'
          description: Successful Request
      summary: Quotes Overview
  /ratings_history:
    get:
      description: Returns the ratings history of a security identifier.
      parameters:
      - description: Any valid equity security identifier.
        in: query
        name: symbol
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/BaseResponse'
          description: Successful Request
      summary: Ratings History
  /recommendation_trend:
    get:
      description: Returns the recommendation trend of a security identifier.
      parameters:
      - description: Any valid equity security identifier.
        in: query
        name: symbol
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/BaseResponse'
          description: Successful Request
      summary: Recommendation Trend
  /recommendations:
    get:
      description: Returns a list of recommended peers of the provided security identifier.
      parameters:
      - description: Any valid equity security identifier.
        in: query
        name: symbol
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/BaseResponse'
          description: Successful Request
      summary: Recommendations
  /sec_filings:
    get:
      description: Returns the SEC filings of a security identifier.
      parameters:
      - description: Any valid equity security identifier.
        in: query
        name: symbol
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/BaseResponse'
          description: Successful Request
      summary: SEC Filings
  /shares_outstanding:
    get:
      description: Returns by date the quantity of outstanding shares of a security
        identifier.
      parameters:
      - description: Any valid equity security identifier.
        in: query
        name: symbol
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
      - description: Start date encoded as an UNIX epoch timestamp.
        in: query
        name: startDate
        required: true
        schema:
          type: integer
      - description: End date encoded as an UNIX epoch timestamp.
        in: query
        name: endDate
        required: true
        schema:
          type: integer
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/BaseResponse'
          description: Successful Request
      summary: Shares Outstanding
  /trending_symbols:
    get:
      description: Returns a list of currently trending security identifiers.
      parameters:
      - description: Quantity of trending security identifiers to return.
        in: query
        name: count
        required: false
        schema:
          type: integer
      - description: Option to include quotes data with the returned security identifiers.
        in: query
        name: useQuotes
        required: false
        schema:
          type: boolean
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/BaseResponse'
          description: Successful Request
      summary: Trending Symbols
  /validate_symbols:
    get:
      description: Returns the list of provided security identifiers checked for validity.
      parameters:
      - description: Comma-separated list of valid security identifiers.
        in: query
        name: symbols
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/BaseResponse'
          description: Successful Request
      summary: Validate Symbols
